channel.title: Docs on Community Infrastructure Working Group
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Community Infrastructure Working Group

item.title: About
item.description: Background # The Community Infrastructure Working Group (CIWG) is focused on development of open-source infrastructure for operations and governance of communities, organizations, schools, and workplaces, with NOMCON, Nation of Makers, the Maker community, and our shared physical and virtual spaces as reference implementations. We launched the CIWG at the end of NOMCON 2022. The conference relied on nearly a dozen third-party services, thousands of lines of custom Python and Go code, and hundreds of hours of volunteer and staff time to fill in the gaps between and outside those systems.
